main event: An observer reported seeing a blue-white light on January 3, 1966, in Miamisburg, Trotwood, Oberlin, Ohio, identified as a meteor.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 30 seconds,The object moved slowly from north to east and then disappeared behind trees,The object was described as brighter than any common object,The edges of the object were noted to be fuzzy or blurred,The observer reported a hissing sound associated with the object.
witness description: adult female who reported the sighting after a church meeting
